title: Reader's Digest India - February 2018 (gnv64)
description: Reader's Digest India - February 2018 English | 166 pages | True PDF | 24.5 mb Cover Story 50 EXTRAORDINARY INDIANS - Seven amazing stories of real-life heroes. TEAM RD 64 YOUR HEALTHIEST (AND HAPPIEST) YEAR EVER - Expert-backed advice for a better you. GAGAN DHILLON 74 THE PRISONER AND THE ENCYCLOPEDIA EDITOR - A misprint forges a surprising friendship. DANIEL A. GROSS 86 A STAR IS BORN - India’s favourite cricketer shares memories from his childhood. SACHIN TENDULKAR Drama in Real Life 92 ANATOMY OF A PERFECT HAND TRANSPLANT - A groundbreaking surgery gives a man hope. AMY WALLACE Kindness of Strangers 102 BAND OF BROTHERS; AMAZING GRACE - Help always comes when you least expect it. 106 BACK TO THE FUTURE - Preserving archaeological treasures through technology. SUSANNAH HICKLING 114 THOSE WERE THE DAYS - Get a blast from the past with these unforgettable ads. ASMITA BAKSHI 124 FROZEN - A couple embraces the cold to catch the aurora borealis. PETER HELLER Classic Bonus Read 133 CHARACTER STUDIES - Stories on connections that transformed lives. READER FAVOURITES 16 Humour in Uniform 18 See the World Differently 26 Points to Ponder 30 It Happens Only in India 48 Life’s Like That 72 All in a Day’s Work 122 Laughter, the Best Medicine 132 As Kids See It 154 Quiz 157 Word Power 164 Quotable Quotes REGULAR FEATURES 13 Dear Reader 14 Over to You 28 Good News 37 Shocking Notes 40 News from the World of Medicine 81 Laugh Lines 163 Studio VOICES & VIEWS New Year Special 22 Absurdly Positive - India’s most-loved comedians tell us their wish for 2018. AYUSHI THAPLIYAL Department of Wit 24 Putting My Word-of-the-Day Calendar to Good Use - The author launches his year with new vocabulary.
